questions.question: Set in the East Blue, this arc features Luffy's first encounter with a Marine Captain known for his iron mace. What is...?
Taking place on a unique island, this arc introduces the character of Chopper, a reindeer with the ability to transform. What is...?
This arc is set in a marine base and features Luffy's attempt to infiltrate the base to retrieve a crew member. What is...?
This technique used by Luffy in Gear Fourth involves inflating his muscles and using Haki to maintain form. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Blackbeard Pirates, allows the user to create and control earthquakes. What is...?
This latest transformation of Luffy, revealed in the Wano arc, shows a significant boost in his powers and abilities. What is...?
This commander of the Revolutionary Army's eastern forces is known for her ability to turn her body into art. Who is...?
This captain of the Red Hair Pirates is known for his laid-back demeanor and being one of the Four Emperors. Who is...?
This former member of the Royal Shichibukai is known for their Snake-Snake Fruit powers and role as the queen of Amazon Lily. Who is...?
